Plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.
Title: The Grifters
Actors: Anjelica Huston, John Cusack, Annette Bening, Jan Munroe
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 14 nominations.
